Hi, where is the source for "zeronet.cmd" that gets installed in the windows startup folder when you install? 

There's a slight bug I'd like to make a pull request. The cmd window that sets the codepage stays open on Windows10 Server for some reason.

> [nofish](#comment_883_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It's there: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/blob/master/plugins/Trayicon/TrayiconPlugin.py#L140

I have made a new pull request on github, it was several characters fix.
